name: Zombie Potatoes
description:
English

Just as the potatoes are about to sprout, a solar eclipse darkens the world. At the same time, a meteorite crashes on Swedish soil, transforming the field’s golden taters into evil zombies.

All but one…

Estrella are proud to present a fast paced and challenging zombie game, filled to the rim with adrenaline and humour.

As a player, you take on the role of the very last healthy potato. You are forced to destroy waves of zombie potatoes, rushing in to catch you. Your lifesavers in this mayhem are bomb-traps and enormous saw blades that shred your enemies – preferably as many as possible at the same time.


•Earn chips for your zombie slashing
•Use chips to unlock lots of weapons and upgrades
•Explore a huge map and play in different environments
•Play several characters

What are you waiting for? Ready, steady, mash!
